p: In summary, through the discussions of Figs. 3 to 5, an overarching theoretical framework is established to understand the polymorphism of deposited Zn crystals shown in Fig. 2; this framework serves this purpose reasonably wellâ€”The factor(s) dominating each of these morphologies is unraveled. Specifically, the SEI and the crystal anisotropy are the central factors to consider in battery-relevant scenarios away from the diffusion limit. On this basis, we outline in next section ( Fig. 6) the most active and fruitful lines of future studies aimed at precisely regulating the Zn deposition morphology in fulfilling the reversibility benchmarks specified in Fig. 1.
